video.title: The Crazy Ones
video.synopsis: Comedy icon Robin Williams returns to television in this raucous sitcom about an advertising wizard and his eccentric family and staff.

episodes.synopsis: With a big client threatening to jump ship, ad man Simon tries to recruit Kelly Clarkson to sing a jingle in the hopes of impressing them.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Disaster ensues when Sydney takes the lead on a campaign for Windy City Coffee. Meanwhile, Simon asks Andrew to take care of a family of ducklings.
episodes.title: The Spectacular

episodes.synopsis: Simon wants to make up for Sydney's bad childhood memories by teaching her how to drive again; Lauren shatters Andrew's confidence.
episodes.title: Bad Dad

episodes.synopsis: While trying to brainstorm ideas for a breakfast burrito ad campaign, the gang procrastinates and delves into one another's personal lives.
episodes.title: Breakfast Burrito Club

episodes.synopsis: When a worldly client comes to town, Sydney, Zach and Simon each compete for her attention -- and realize they may know too much about one another.
episodes.title: She's So European

episodes.synopsis: When Simon is nominated for a prestigious advertising award, Sydney is surprised to learn that her high school crush is also in the running.
episodes.title: Hugging the Now

episodes.synopsis: An infatuated former co-worker of Sydney's writes a stalker-ish song about her. Meanwhile, Simon struggles to pitch the Australian Tourism Board.
episodes.title: Sydney, Australia

episodes.synopsis: Gordon forces Simon to give up the very first account he ever worked on when it conflicts with another client.
episodes.title: The Stan Wood Account

episodes.synopsis: Someone's job is on the line at the annual Accounts vs. Creatives 16-inch softball game, and the truth about Simon's last win threatens to surface.
episodes.title: Sixteen-Inch Softball

episodes.synopsis: While Simon and Gordon disagree on compromising their values to land a lucrative client, Lauren gets stuck in a multimillion-dollar bra.
episodes.title: Models Love Magic

episodes.synopsis: Sydney's insecurities about how she is perceived resurface when the bratty daughter of an important client becomes the agency's intern.
episodes.title: The Intern

episodes.synopsis: When Simon mixes up the assignments in the office, he puts Sydney on an account for a video game that she becomes addicted to winning.
episodes.title: The Face of a Winner

episodes.synopsis: Simon gives Lauren a chance to work with a big client facing a PR disaster when the rest of the office comes down with the flu.
episodes.title: Outbreak

episodes.synopsis: When the agency's new research analyst defeats Simon in a creativity contest, Zach and Andrew work together to help Simon get his groove back.
episodes.title: Simon Roberts Was Here

episodes.synopsis: A woman asks Simon to eulogize her deceased father, a jingle writer who was not a well-liked man.
episodes.title: Dead and Improved

episodes.synopsis: Simon offers to throw a client's son's bar mitzvah, but Zach's run-in with the only woman he's ever loved may upend the festivities.
episodes.title: Zach Mitzvah

episodes.synopsis: Simon's desperation for grandchildren forces him to interfere with Sydney's new relationship; Zach and Andrew try working with other partners.
episodes.title: Heavy Meddling

episodes.synopsis: Simon's hatred for all things related to St. Patrick's Day is exacerbated when Andrew's rowdy sisters descend on the office to celebrate the holiday.
episodes.title: March Madness

episodes.synopsis: Trying to channel Simon, Zach overpromises on a pitch and must get Brad Paisley to sing a jingle written by Danny Chase.
episodes.title: Danny Chase Hates Brad Paisley

episodes.synopsis: Simon's promising new relationship is tested when he becomes disillusioned with love after Gordon and his partner break up.
episodes.title: Love Sucks

episodes.synopsis: Simon and the team try an out-of-the-box idea to save a library from being shut down, and Gordon literally becomes the campaign's poster boy.
episodes.title: The Monster

episodes.synopsis: When a corporation wants to buy out Lewis, Roberts+Roberts, Gordon calls in the board to vote, and Simon's ex-wife has the final say.
episodes.title: The Lighthouse
